column2: select AD.MOBILE_NO, C.COMPANY_ABBR, AD.ADJUST_AMT, AD.ADJUST_VALIDITY, AD.ADJUST_STATUS, AD.TRANSPARENT_DATA1, AD.TRANSPARENT_DATA2, AD.BILLING_SYSTEM, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(AD.ADJUST_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ADJUST_DTM, PMDB..PM_F_FORMAT_DATE(AD.ADJUST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ADJUST_DATE, AD.FILE_ID, AD.GEN_DOC_TYPE from PMDB..PM_ADJUST_TRANSACTION AD inner join PMDB..PM_FILE_ADJUST F on (AD.FILE_ID = F.FILE_ID) inner join PMDB..PM_COMPANY C on (AD.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID) where F.ORDER_ID = @order_id
